recipe.title: Macadamia Nut "Ricotta"
instructions: DO THIS: In a food processor or a high powered blender, purée the ingredients together until smooth. If necessary, scrape down the sides with a spatula and/or add a bit more water. The resulting texture should resemble—you guessed it!—ricotta cheese.
